20110125151154.000|20110125151156.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN A MAN AND A WOMAN,

20110125151233.000|20110125151236.000|CC1|SECURITY OFFICIALS AND          
20110125151236.000|20110125151239.000|CC1|TERRORISTS, HAVE BOTH LONG KNOWN
20110125151239.000|20110125151241.000|CC1|ABOUT THE VULNERABILITIES       
20110125151241.000|20110125151242.000|CC1|AT AIRPORTS OUTSIDE OF THE      
20110125151242.000|20110125151243.000|CC1|SCREENING CHECKPOINTS.          
20110125151243.000|20110125151243.000|CC1|AND WE FOUND SERIOUS QUESTIONS  
20110125151243.000|20110125151244.000|CC1|ABOUT WHAT IS BEING DONE IN THE 
20110125151244.000|20110125151245.000|CC1|U.S. TO MAKE AIRPORTS SAFER.    
20110125151245.000|20110125151246.000|CC1|BY DESIGN, THERE'S EASY, OPEN   
20110125151246.000|20110125151248.000|CC1|ACCESS TO AMERICAN AIRPORTS.    
20110125151248.000|20110125151250.000|CC1|WITH VIRTUALLY NO SECURITY UNTIL
20110125151250.000|20110125151251.000|CC1|WELL PAST THE ARRIVAL AND       
20110125151251.000|20110125151254.000|CC1|DEPARTURE AREAS.                
20110125151254.000|20110125151255.000|CC1|IN FACT, EVEN THE ENHANCED      
20110125151255.000|20110125151255.000|CC1|SCREENING AT SECURITY           
20110125151255.000|20110125151258.000|CC1|CHECKPOINTS HAS CREATED ANOTHER 
20110125151258.000|20110125151300.000|CC1|AIRPORT VULNERABILITY.          
20110125151300.000|20110125151301.000|CC1|>> THE TERRORIST DOESN'T HAVE TO
20110125151301.000|20110125151301.000|CC1|GET PAST THE CHECKPOINT AND ON  
20110125151301.000|20110125151307.000|CC1|TO AN AIRPLANE.                 
20110125151307.000|20110125151308.000|CC1|IT'S A RICH TARGET ENVIRONMENT  
20110125151308.000|20110125151311.000|CC1|RIGHT THERE AT THE CHECKPOINT.  
20110125151311.000|20110125151311.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TO COMBAT THAT, THE
20110125151311.000|20110125151313.000|CC1|TSA HAS DEPLOYED SOME 3,000     
20110125151313.000|20110125151314.000|CC1|UNSEEN OFFICERS TO ROAM AMERICAN
20110125151314.000|20110125151317.000|CC1|AIRPORTS, LOOKING FOR SUSPICIOUS
20110125151317.000|20110125151319.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR, UNDER A CONTROVERSIAL 
20110125151319.000|20110125151321.000|CC1|PROGRAM CALLED S.P.O.T.         
20110125151321.000|20110125151324.000|CC1|UNDER THE PROGRAM, OFFICERS ARE 
20110125151324.000|20110125151326.000|CC1|GIVEN FOUR DAYS OF CLASSROOM    
20110125151326.000|20110125151329.000|CC1|TRAINING TO SPOT BODY MOVEMENTS 
20110125151329.000|20110125151330.000|CC1|AND FACIAL, MICROEXPRESSIONS,   
20110125151330.000|20110125151335.000|CC1|SAID TO BE TIPOFFS.             
20110125151335.000|20110125151337.000|CC1|>> ALTHOUGH THEY BOTH APPEAR TO 
20110125151337.000|20110125151338.000|CC1|GLARE.                          
20110125151338.000|20110125151338.000|CC1|>> IF YOU HAVE ONE OF THOSE     
20110125151338.000|20110125151339.000|CC1|EMOTIONS, IT'S GOING TO APPEAR  
20110125151339.000|20110125151339.000|CC1|ON YOUR FACE.                   
20110125151339.000|20110125151340.000|CC1|AND IF YOU'RE TRYING TO CONCEAL 
20110125151340.000|20110125151341.000|CC1|IT, IT MAY WELL LEAK OUT IN A   
20110125151341.000|20110125151342.000|CC1|MICROEXPRESSION.                
20110125151342.000|20110125151343.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT CRITICS SAY

20110125151349.000|20110125151350.000|CC1|>> THE SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH SHOWS
20110125151350.000|20110125151353.000|CC1|IT'S HARD TO DETECT WHETHER
